## RuntimeScript.onDetached() method

Called when the script is detached from a host.

Use this to stop host-specific behaviors and release host-bound resources.

**Signature:**

```typescript
onDetached(_host: T): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

\_host


</td><td>

T


</td><td>

The host the script is being detached from.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void
